author: Your Name (YourName#0000)
install_msg:
Thank you for installing PlayFile! This cog allows you to play attached audio files in your voice channel. Use `[p]playfile` with an attached audio file to play it.
This cog requires the Audio cog to be loaded and configured, as it uses Lavalink for playback.
name: PlayFile
short: Play attached audio files in voice channels
description: This cog allows users to play attached audio files (mp3, wav, aac, flac) in their current voice channel using the `[p]playfile` command.
